domain.description: Host header to send in the HTTP request. May not contain spaces, percent or backslash symbols. Can be null, in that case no host header is sent.

path.description: HTTP path to use for health checks. May not contain literal spaces, use percent-encoding instead.

response.description: String that must be contained in HTTP response in order to pass the health check

status_codes.description: List of returned HTTP status codes in order to pass the health check. Supports the wildcards `?` for exactly one character and `*` for multiple ones.
